basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I am Tony Bruno, a curious and motivated individual, always seeking new challenges. My journey has led me to specialize in technologies such as React, JavaScript, and HTML5/CSS3, as well as tools like Redux and MongoDB. Beyond technical skills, I make it a priority to understand user needs and provide tailored and effective solutions.ðŸ˜Š

projects.title: Riding Cities
projects.description: First project involved updating the website of Riding Cities, a sports association that promotes skateboarding in the region. It is thanks to this project that I discovered HTML.

projects.title: Booki
projects.description: Booki is a website that allows users to find accommodations and activities in the city of their choice. It was by integrating the website's interface that I was able to discover CSS.

projects.title: Ohmyfood
projects.description: With Ohmyfood, users can create their meal menus and say goodbye to wait times at restaurants. I also created CSS animations to make the user experience even more enjoyable. Additionally, the site is responsive on smartphones and tablets !

projects.title: Print it
projects.description: Print it is a small family-owned printing shop that wanted to add a carousel to its website. It is thanks to this project that I discovered JavaScript and was able to implement this feature.

projects.title: Sophie Bluel
projects.description: Here is the portfolio of an interior designer for which I created a project gallery with a filtering system, an admin login page, and a modal to add and delete projects.

projects.title: Kasa
projects.description: The goal of this apartment rental company was to completely rebuild their website using JavaScript, with Node.js for the back-end and React for the front-end.

projects.title: Nina Carducci
projects.description: For Nina Carducci, optimizing local SEO and site performance was essential. I took charge of improving SEO, enhancing technical performance, and implementing Lighthouse audits and Rich Snippets to boost the site's visibility and efficiency.

projects.title: 724 Events
projects.description: This company faced issues on its website, particularly with the carousel and the filtering system for their projects. I resolved these problems using React and JavaScript.

projects.title: Argent Bank
projects.description: I would say this is my biggest project to date: the creation of a banking application allowing users to log in and manage their accounts. This project also gave me the opportunity to discover the Redux library and Swagger documentation.
